title: Is PBE getting public or will Riot create a way people could apply for it that is sure
body: I dont know all this content riot uploads about beta and i got conffused are they releasing pbe or are they releasing a beta vesrion of the new client.Riot dont read the boards ever so i will get my question unanswered from them but does someone from the community have an answer will riot release a way to sign in to the pbe and if they do it when cause a lot of people have an account and i want too and i applied for thing there "i want to help" but nothing happened. Pl Riot if you read this you can always click on a few buttons and send me an email where you tell me i am accepted in the pbe and now i can download the launcher and login this password... Pl Riot i still believe in you and if there are people in the community who have accounts in the pbe tell me how to make one{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
We actually do read the boards quite frequently, although you may not always see a direct response. This particular board has *Porocles* and I assigned to it, so you can be sure we read every post on here. ^.^

To answer your question, the [Open Beta](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/daa98393-2e6f-48c2-9bf7-8f5ad5b99a34) for the updated League Client has just launched. This **is not** the PBE, this is simply the new client that will eventually replace the Legacy Client.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
